file_content.text: [Nothing happens. The altar is silent.]
You do not belong here, honored one.
You have earned your place in the shrine. But the vision was clear.
Another Mystic has been chosen. You must leave.
I'm an outsider. You should get your eyes checked.
I'm not a Mystic.
The vision has upset you. You are not well.
Are these the trials? Is this some kind of test?
Leave? Why?
I killed a lot of Gormak to get here. I'm not going anywhere.
Get out of my way.
We do not deny your skill.
Many have protested this decision. You are not the first.
We cannot force you to leave, honored one. You must decide for yourself.
I'm not sure what a Mystic would say, but I'll try to guess.
As if I were a Mystic?
You can answer only as you were taught.
I don't understand.
You are a Mystic. Respond as one.
If you'll let me pass.
You will choose to stay or go.
Darel-Ka has had a vision. A Voss will be brought to the shrine for healing.
This person must survive. You are our best healer. Yet you were not in the vision.
Darel-Ka has seen another, lesser healer. He must take your place.
I earned my place. Your replacement doesn't deserve it.
But I'm the best!
We do what is necessary. Not what is fair.
You might wish you had me around when the time comes.
Suppose he's wrong.
The Mystics are never wrong.
Replace me, then. I'm sure I can find other Voss to heal.
Doesn't bother me.
Others object on your behalf. They must hear your words.
Only the healer in the vision will succeed. Another could bring disaster.
The vision asks you to step aside for another. You must follow it.
I'm the best healer you have. You need me.
I won't step down.
We need only what the Mystics see.
Your choice doesn't make sense, but I can't argue with a vision.
I'll follow the vision.
We do what we must.
Time grows short, honored one. We must decide.
Part of your vision is clear. We must join the Republic or the Empire to survive.
The interpreters have spent months debating. The outsiders grow restless.
The Empire is stronger. They'll make better allies than the Republic.
Choose the Empire.
I seem to recall a lot of Imperial imagery.
Join the Empire.
Only an interpreter can find meaning.
Flipping a credcoin would work faster.
Do you blame them?
Wrong interpretations can lead to disaster.
Do the interpreters usually take this long?
That's quite a debate.
Never with such an important vision.
I had the vision. My part in this is done.
Why bother me about it?
Interpreters are chosen by the Mystics. You can replace them.
The interpreters stress patience. Can we afford to wait?
I'll pick new interpreters. They'll give you a quick answer.
Get rid of those idiots.
Meaning cannot be forced.
A decision like this can't be rushed.
They need more time.
Signs reveal themselves when ready.
You are a coward. Stand and fight.
There is no cause. We have seen enough war.
Honored one. The civil war you saw must end. Many Voss will die.
They die for our future, honored one. This war will bring prosperity.
Mystics have visions. Voss do as they're told.
Then you have no choice.
I do not deny your vision. I question following it.
You've turned on each other because of a vision?
Let me get this straight....
The vision was yours. You saw how to prevent disaster.
How will killing each other improve Voss?
War doesn't work like that.
Those who can help Voss endure will survive. The rest will die.
All are innocent. We have no quarrel.
Your concerns are irrelevant. We do what is necessary.
You saw this war first, honored one. Advise us.
This war was part of a vision. You fight until it's over.
Visions must be followed.
As you have seen.
A vision is no reason to kill each other.
Stop this nonsense.
We sacrifice so the Voss may endure.
A moment, honored one. I am your guardian.
Your vision calls you to the Nightmare Lands. You saw yourself enter alone.
The Nightmare Lands claim many lives. You will need protection.
I can handle whatever the Nightmare Lands hold.
Don't worry about me.
Madness poisons that place. Going alone is death.
What are the Nightmare Lands?
The Nightmare Lands?
The oldest part of Voss. A dark forest full of dangers.
What I need is less lip.
The guardians protect the Mystics.
Mystics are rarely called to leave the shrine. You must succeed.
Your death accomplishes nothing. Let me escort you.
Whatever the Nightmare Lands bring, I'll handle myself.
I have to go alone.
As you have seen.
If I'm going to make it back alive, I'll need a guide.
I should have backup.
You did not see a guardian.
A Mystic must know his role. You understand.
Go forward. Corruption lies ahead. Destroy the source.
[The altar cannot be activated right now.]
Forgive me, honored one. I seek your guidance.
I have had a vision. The things I saw were strange, troubling.
I am still in training. I need your help to discover the meaning of my vision.
Do Mystics usually help potentials with their visions?
Is that normal?
A potential's visions are usually clear. I am the first to ask.
How can I help?
I will tell you what I saw. You will tell me what it means.
You'll never be a Mystic at this rate.
You're pathetic.
I am only a potential. My sight is not always clear.
You are a full Mystic. You have had many visions. You know what to look for.
My vision could mean great changes. I must be certain of its meaning.
Mystics have visions. They don't analyze them.
Meaning is not my job.
Only interpreters can find meaning.
A Mystic must know his role. You understand.
Go forward. Corruption lies ahead. Destroy the source.
Tell me what you saw. I'll know what it means.
I'll translate your vision.
That is not a Mystic's role.
A Mystic sees. You are blind.
Your ignorance is a taint. It will be removed.
Honored one. I must question your choice.
The Mystics choose the Three. You have seen me replaced.
I am forced to make way for a child. This cannot be borne.
Take charge. Tell the Three you're not leaving.
Fight for your place.
I know the law. The Three shall never grow.
Why come to me?
You saw me step down. Perhaps you did not see clearly.
The way you Voss run things, maybe a child could do better.
You probably deserve it.
I have led the Voss through wars and back.
I have served faithfully. I should serve still.
Please, honored one--look again. You may see differently.
You've been replaced. Accept it and move on.
I can't change what I saw.
To question is not to deny.
A Mystic sees. You are blind.
Your ignorance is a taint. It will be removed.
Either I'll see the same thing, or you'll get your job back.
I'll take a second look.
Mystics can only see the truth.
A Mystic must know his role. You understand.
Go forward. Corruption lies ahead. Destroy the source.
A Mystic must know his role. You understand.
Go forward. Corruption lies ahead. Destroy the source.
A Mystic sees. You are blind.
Your ignorance is a taint. It will be removed.
A Mystic must know his role. You understand.
Go forward. Corruption lies ahead. Destroy the source.
A Mystic sees. You are blind.
Your ignorance is a taint. It will be removed.
A Mystic must know his role. You understand.
Go forward. Corruption lies ahead. Destroy the source.
A Mystic sees. You are blind.
Your ignorance is a taint. It will be removed.
A Mystic sees. You are blind.
Your ignorance is a taint. It will be removed.
